name: Boba Factory
description:
Boba Factory is a single-player bubble tea simulation game that takes place in a demanding factory.   Prepare specific bubble tea orders under a certain time limit and become a boba expert!  Be warned, this is harder than you think :)!

CONTROLS

Left-Click on an "Ingredients Dispenser" to add ingredients to your cup.
Right-Click anywhere for a new cup.

FEEDBACK WELCOME

As we are still in the initial stages of developing Boba Factory, we're going to need all the feedback we can get!  Please let us know if you find any bugs / things that annoy you when testing our little game!
